body:
Shen {{champion:98}}
LEVEL: STATISTICS 
HEALTH  600 – 2045  ATTACK DAMAGE  64 – 120 (ad grow 3,1)
HEALTH REGEN.   9.0 – 23   ATTACK SPEED 0.651  (+ 15 – 49%)
ENERGY  400     ARMOR   36 – 90
ENERGY REGEN.  50  MAGIC RESIST.  32.1 – 53.4
RANGE  125       MOVE. SPEED   340

>  KI BARRIER: _STATIC COOLDOWN: 12 / 11 / 10 (lv 1/6/11)_
After using an ability, Shenshields himself from 60 - 120 (based on level) (+ 5% / 6% / 7% Max health) damage for 2.5 seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one champion, Ki Barrier's Cooldown is reduced by 5 / 6 / 7 (lv 1/6/11) seconds.
Shen's power manifests as a Spirit Blade that he can control with his abilities.

> Twilight Assault:     _ COST: 140 / 130 / 120 / 110 / 100 ENERGY COOLDOWN: 10 / 9 / 8 / 7 / 6_
Shen recalls his Spirit Blade to his location. Enemies the blade collides with are slowed by 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% for the next 2 seconds when moving away from Shen.
bonus magic damage: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 (+ 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
total magic damage: 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 (+ 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
INCREASED BONUS DAMAGE: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40(+ 4 / 4.5 / 5 / 5.5 / 6% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
TOTAL INCREASED BONUS DAMAGE: 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 (+ 12 / 13.5 / 15 / 16.5 / 18% (+ 6% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
 _**[NEW]_
_Every empowered autoattacks with Twilight Assault on an enemy champion´s heal shen for 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 / 13 + [0,5 % maximum health] (in total 15 / 21 / 27 / 33 / 39 + [1,5 % maximum health])
ENCHANTED autoattacks with Twilight Assault on an enemy champion´s heal shen for 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 + [1 % maximum health] (in total 18 / 24 / 30 / 36 / 42 + [3 % maximum health])
_
> **Spirit's Refuge:  _COST: 50 ENERGY COOLDOWN: 16 / 15 / 14 / 13 / 12_
ACTIVE: Shen primes his Spirit Blade, creating an area around it. If Shen or an allied champion enter the area, or after 2 seconds, the Spirit Blade creates a protective zone around it for 2 seconds, causing allies in the zone to dodge attacks.

> Shadow Dash: _ TARGET RANGE: 600   COLLISION RADIUS: 60    COST: 140 ENERGY COOLDOWN: 16 / 15 / 14 / 13 / 12_
PASSIVE: Damage from Shadow Dash Shadow Dash and Twilight Assault Twilight Assault recovers 30 / 35 / 40 energy.
ACTIVE: Shen dashes in the target direction, dealing Attack damage physical damage to all enemy champions and monsters he hits and Taunt icon taunting them for 1.5 seconds.
PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 60 / 85 / 125 / 150 / 175 (+ 5%/5,5%/6%/6,5%/7% Max health)
 _**[NEW]_
During Shadow Dash Shen is immune to crowd controls 

> Stand United:**_ TARGET RANGE: Global COOLDOWN: 180 / 150 / 120  _
ACTIVE: Shen channels for 3 seconds, shielding the target allied champion for up to 5 seconds for 250 / 400 / 550 (160% ap)
Upon completing the channel, Shen and his Spirit Blade blink to the target ally's location.
